text: 14th Street - Union Square is a station on the BMT Broadway Line, BMT Canarsie Line and IRT Lexington Avenue Line of the New York City Subway. Located at the intersection of 14th Street and 4th Avenue under Union Square in Manhattan. It is served by the L, N, Q, R, W, 4, 5 and 6 trains. ==References== Category:Manhattan
